verses.verse: Therefore <S%G1352><s%> you are <S%G1488><s%> without excuse, <S%G379><s%> O <S%G5599><s%> man, <S%G444><s%> whoever you are <S%G3956><s%> who judge. <S%G2919><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> that <S%G3739><s%> which you <S%G846><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> another, <S%G2087><s%> you condemn <S%G2632><s%> yourself. <S%G4572><s%> For <S%G1063><s%> you who judge <S%G2919><s%> practice the same things. <S%G4238><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> We know <S%G1492><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> truth <S%G225><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> those who practice <S%G4238><s%> such things. <S%G5108><s%>

<S%G1161><s%> Do you think <S%G3049><s%> this, <S%G5124><s%> O <S%G5599><s%> man <S%G444><s%> who judges <S%G2919><s%> those who practice <S%G4238><s%> such things, <S%G5108><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> do <S%G4238><s%> the same, <S%G846><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> will escape <S%G1628><s%> the judgment <S%G2917><s%> of God? <S%G2316><s%>

Or <S%G2228><s%> do you despise <S%G2706><s%> the riches <S%G4149><s%> of his <S%G846><s%> goodness, <S%G5544><s%> forbearance, <S%G463><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> patience, <S%G3115><s%> not knowing <S%G50><s%> that <S%G3754><s%> the goodness <S%G5543><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> leads <S%G71><s%> you <S%G4571><s%> to <S%G1519><s%> repentance? <S%G3341><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to your <S%G4675><s%> hardness <S%G4643><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> unrepentant <S%G279><s%> heart <S%G2588><s%> you are treasuring up <S%G2343><s%> for yourself <S%G4572><s%> wrath <S%G3709><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> of wrath, <S%G3709><s%> revelation, <S%G602><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the righteous judgment <S%G1341><s%> of God; <S%G2316><s%>
who <S%G3739><s%> "will pay <S%G591><s%> back to everyone <S%G1538><s%> according to <S%G2596><s%> their <S%G846><s%> works: <S%G2041><s%>"

to those <S%G3588><s%> who by <S%G2596><s%> patience <S%G5281><s%> in <S%G18><s%> well-doing <S%G2041><s%> seek for <S%G2212><s%> glory, <S%G1391><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> incorruptibility, <S%G861><s%> eternal <S%G166><s%> life; <S%G2222><s%>

but <S%G1161><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who are self-seeking, <S%G2052><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> don't <S%G544><s%> obey the truth, <S%G225><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> obey <S%G3982><s%> unrighteousness, <S%G93><s%> will be wrath <S%G3709><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> indignation, <S%G2372><s%>

oppression <S%G2347><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> anguish, <S%G4730><s%> on <S%G1909><s%> every <S%G3956><s%> soul <S%G5590><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> who works <S%G2716><s%> evil, <S%G2556><s%> to the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to the Greek. <S%G1672><s%>

But <S%G1161><s%> glory, <S%G2532><s%> honor, <S%G5092><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> peace <S%G1515><s%> go to every man <S%G3956><s%> who works <S%G2038><s%> good, <S%G18><s%> to the Jew <S%G2453><s%> first, <S%G4412><s%> and <S%G5037><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> to the Greek. <S%G1672><s%>
For <S%G1063><s%> there is <S%G2076><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> partiality <S%G4382><s%> with <S%G3844><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> as many as <S%G3745><s%> have sinned <S%G264><s%> without law <S%G460><s%> will <S%G622><s%> also <S%G2532><s%> perish <S%G622><s%> without the law. <S%G460><s%> As <S%G2532><s%> many as <S%G3745><s%> have sinned <S%G264><s%> under <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> will be judged <S%G2919><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> the law. <S%G3551><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> it isn't <S%G3756><s%> the hearers <S%G202><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> who are righteous <S%G1342><s%> before <S%G3844><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%> but <S%G235><s%> the doers <S%G4163><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> will be justified <S%G1344><s%>

(for <S%G1063><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> who don't <S%G3361><s%> have <S%G2192><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> do <S%G4160><s%> by nature <S%G5449><s%> the things <S%G3588><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> these, <S%G3778><s%> not <S%G3361><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> are <S%G1526><s%> a law <S%G3551><s%> to themselves, <S%G1438><s%>

in that <S%G3748><s%> they show <S%G1731><s%> the work <S%G2041><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> written <S%G1123><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> their <S%G846><s%> hearts, <S%G2588><s%> their <S%G846><s%> conscience <S%G4893><s%> testifying <S%G4828><s%> with them, <S%G2532><s%> and their thoughts <S%G3053><s%> among <S%G3342><s%> themselves <S%G240><s%> accusing <S%G2723><s%> or else <S%G2228><s%> <S%G2532><s%> excusing them <S%G626><s%>)

in <S%G1722><s%> the day <S%G2250><s%> when <S%G3753><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> will judge <S%G2919><s%> the secrets <S%G2927><s%> of men, <S%G444><s%> according <S%G2596><s%> to my <S%G3450><s%> Good News, <S%G2098><s%> by <S%G1223><s%> Jesus <S%G2424><s%> Christ. <S%G5547><s%>

Indeed <S%G1492><s%> you <S%G4771><s%> bear the name <S%G2028><s%> of a Jew, <S%G2453><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> rest <S%G1879><s%> on the law, <S%G3551><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> God, <S%G2316><s%>

and <S%G2532><s%> know <S%G1097><s%> his will, <S%G2307><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> approve <S%G1381><s%> the things that are excellent, <S%G1308><s%> being instructed <S%G2727><s%> out of <S%G1537><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%>

and <S%G5037><s%> are confident that <S%G3982><s%> you yourself <S%G4572><s%> are <S%G1511><s%> a guide <S%G3595><s%> of the blind, <S%G5185><s%> a light <S%G5457><s%> to those <S%G3588><s%> who are in <S%G1722><s%> darkness, <S%G4655><s%>

a corrector <S%G3810><s%> of the foolish, <S%G878><s%> a teacher <S%G1320><s%> of babies, <S%G3516><s%> having <S%G2192><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the law <S%G3551><s%> the form <S%G3446><s%> of knowledge <S%G1108><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> of the truth. <S%G225><s%>

You <S%G3588><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> who teach <S%G1321><s%> another, <S%G2087><s%> don't <S%G3756><s%> you <S%G1321><s%> teach yourself? <S%G4572><s%> You who preach <S%G2784><s%> that a man shouldn't <S%G3361><s%> steal, <S%G2813><s%> do you steal? <S%G2813><s%>

You who say <S%G3004><s%> a man shouldn't <S%G3361><s%> commit adultery. <S%G3431><s%> Do you commit adultery? <S%G3431><s%> You who abhor <S%G948><s%> idols, <S%G1497><s%> do you rob temples? <S%G2416><s%>

You who <S%G3739><s%> glory <S%G2744><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> through <S%G1223><s%> your disobedience <S%G3847><s%> of the law <S%G3551><s%> do you <S%G818><s%> dishonor God? <S%G2316><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> "the name <S%G3686><s%> of God <S%G2316><s%> is blasphemed <S%G987><s%> among <S%G1722><s%> the Gentiles <S%G1484><s%> because <S%G5209><s%> of you, <S%G5209><s%>" just as <S%G2531><s%> it is written. <S%G1125><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> indeed <S%G3303><s%> profits, <S%G5623><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you are a doer <S%G4238><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> but <S%G1161><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> you are <S%G1510><s%> a transgressor <S%G3848><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> your <S%G4675><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> has become <S%G1096><s%> uncircumcision. <S%G203><s%>

If <S%G1437><s%> therefore <S%G3767><s%> the uncircumcised <S%G203><s%> keep <S%G5442><s%> the ordinances <S%G1345><s%> of the law, <S%G3551><s%> won't <S%G3780><s%> his <S%G846><s%> uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> be accounted <S%G3049><s%> as <S%G1519><s%> circumcision? <S%G4061><s%>

<S%G2532><s%> Won't <S%G2919><s%> the uncircumcision <S%G203><s%> which is by <S%G1537><s%> nature, <S%G5449><s%> if it fulfills <S%G5055><s%> the law, <S%G3551><s%> judge <S%G2919><s%> you, <S%G4571><s%> who <S%G3588><s%> with <S%G1223><s%> the letter <S%G1121><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> are a transgressor <S%G3848><s%> of the law? <S%G3551><s%>

For <S%G1063><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> is <S%G2076><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> a Jew <S%G2453><s%> who is one <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1722><s%> outwardly, <S%G5318><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> is that circumcision <S%G1722><s%> which is outward <S%G5318><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the flesh; <S%G4561><s%>

but <S%G235><s%> he <S%G3588><s%> is a Jew <S%G2453><s%> who is one <S%G3588><s%> <S%G1722><s%> inwardly, <S%G2927><s%> and <S%G2532><s%> circumcision <S%G4061><s%> is that of the heart, <S%G2588><s%> in <S%G1722><s%> the spirit <S%G4151><s%> not <S%G3756><s%> in the letter; <S%G1121><s%> whose <S%G3739><s%> praise <S%G1868><s%> is not <S%G3756><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> men, <S%G444><s%> but <S%G235><s%> from <S%G1537><s%> God. <S%G2316><s%>
